title: Diamond Floral Mangalsutra Pendant - A Modern Classic
features: Delicate floral design with pave-set diamonds. Features three prominent flower motifs and a scalloped bottom edge. The rose gold setting enhances the brilliance of the diamonds, providing a modern twist on a traditional design. Designed to be light weight and comfortable for daily wear.
description: This elegant mangalsutra pendant offers a perfect blend of modern design and traditional symbolism. The high-quality diamonds and rose gold setting provide a luxurious and sophisticated look. Its lightweight design ensures comfort for daily wear. A meaningful gift that symbolizes love and commitment.
